properties.directions_en: N side of NE Airport Way
properties.content_en: There is a walk-in access on the north side of the road. No parking.

properties.directions_en: S side of NE Airport Way
properties.content_en: This restored wetland provides excellent habitat for wildlife and many bird species. The NE Airport Way sidewalk provides excellent views, and this area can also be accessed by paddling from the Portland Water Bureau launch.

properties.directions_en: Access to the trail is from the south side of NE Airport Way.
properties.content_en:
A trail extends to the NE 185th Ave city boundary, passing
wetlands and a stormwater treatment pond
along the way. The area is planted with
native vegetation.
